text: I've heard a lot of life lessons from the Frog Prince.
Is it time to say goodbye?
Click on it to send an email~
Tap it to go back to the top!
Do you want to go back to the beginning?

seasons.text: Whispering a secret ~ Today is April Fool's Day, don't be fooled~

time.text: Good morning! A good day is about to begin!
Good morning! Work is going well, don't be sedentary, get up and walk around more often!
It's noon, it's lunchtime after a long morning at work!
It's easy to get sleepy in the late afternoon...did you get your exercise goals done today?
It's evening! The view of the sunset from the window is very beautiful, the most beautiful thing is the red of the sunset.
Good evening. How are you today?

text: It's so late already, get some rest, good night.
Take care of your eyes when it's late at night.

time.text: Are you a night owl? You're still up this late, how can you get up tomorrow?

default: It's been a long time, the days have flown by ......
